title: 'Worst product'
body: 'While it looks so elegant in pictures but in real life it is just average. Some artificial leather is used. As a mouse pad it is worst than a 200/- product. Very slippery and light weight. It always move the entire mat when you try to move the mouse quickly. My much cheaper Red Gear mouse pad is 10x better than this one. I wish I would have checked the return policy first; it is only returnable not refundable. Money wasted. Itâ€™s already day-3 of my usage and this thing has still not lost its corner fold which was caused since it was rolled tightly in the package carton. Pathetic. 0 star.'
